QuestData.Title: The Beginner's Brew
QuestData.Description: Can you keep a secret, $n?$B$BI've been trying my hand at brewing. All I've got is this old hand-made still, but it still works pretty good.$B$BI've got an idea for a new brew, but I need some ingredients.$B$BI'm awful shy around the townsfolk, but I've seen you making friends all around.$B$BWould you be willing to ask the farmers for some ingredients for me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 1 Sweet Lakemelon from Haohan Mudclaw, 1 Fuzzy Peach from Gina Mudclaw, 1 Black Cherries from Fish Fellreed, and 1 Red Radish from Farmer Fung.
